ai-patthana15.56:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously,
ai-patthana15.56:0.3_0: perhaps the wholesome and doing it gets things that are skillful,
ai-patthana15.56:1.1_0: You shouldn’t give up the cause of skillful qualities to be given up by development, nor by developing the skillful.
ai-patthana15.56:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.56:2.1_3: What is the cause of reason for two reasons? ...
ai-patthana15.56:2.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
